The video was shared by Kiran Bedi: the Lt Governor of Puducherry, on her Twitter and Facebook accounts.
Alt News conducted a reverse image searc: 3. The video was uploaded by the Facebook page 'Four Finger Photography' on September 30, 2019, suggesting it was shot at Adelaide Zoo in Australia.
Miklos Nagy: the owner of 'Four Finger Photography', confirmed that he had shot the video at Adelaide Zoo.
